development.title: Development
desc: Our developer`s office is based in Saint-Petersburg, Russia which helps provide best local developers by competitive price.
We see the world through the prism of structured websites and logical components, always striving to deliver this vision through our advanced code and designs.
We pride ourselves on writing clean, maintainable, well thought out code that will scale.

features.name: frontend
features.title: Front End Development
features.desc: The product we deliver is user-friendly, especially on mobile devices.

features.name: backend
features.title: Back End Development
features.desc: We are adept at dealing with business rules, special requirements and regulations, and the responsibilities that come with these parameters due to years of experience in the e-commerce field.

features.name: qa
features.title: Quality Assurance
features.desc: One of the most important aspects of running a successful e-commerce site is reliability. We employ a wide arrange of techniques to ensure that the website we build is stable. Among the techniques we use are: load testing, auto testing and per request unit testing.
